Name: Tilottama\footnotemark{}\strut \footnotetext{\url{http://wheatatlas.org/varieties/detail/26413}}
Production Conditions: Irrigated and semi-irrigated areas of Terai and inner Terai
Notes: Resistant to spot blotch. High tillering. Early maturing, stay green, excellent for bread and chapati.

Name: Bhrikuti\footnotemark{}\strut \footnotetext{\url{http://wheatatlas.org/varieties/detail/22378}}
Selection Code: Line from CIMMYT, further local selection within country

Name: Gautam\footnotemark{}\strut \footnotetext{\url{http://wheatatlas.org/varieties/detail/22383}}
Origin: Cross made in the country, one CIMMYT parent
Production Conditions: Irrigated, both normal and late sown condition of whole Terai, Taar and foot-hills (<500 m); maturity 105-115; potential yield - 5t/ha

Name: Aditya\footnotemark{}\strut \footnotetext{\url{http://wheatatlas.org/varieties/detail/22373}}
Origin: Cross made in the country, no CIMMYT parents
Production Conditions: Terai, Tars and Lower Valleys up to 500 500 masl; maturity 118 days, yield potential 4.8 t/ha
